1.0.name: wordpress/easycommentspaginate
1.0.description: easyCommentsPaginate is a plugin to easily create nice animated pagination for your comments. It's easy but there is also a lot of options ! It is fully customizable : 4 differents animations, texts, css, hash tags ... And yeah, there is a "test mode" in the options to configure your plugin when you edit your posts
